bibl.title: The Reign of Augustus in Egypt. Conversion Tables for the Egyptian and Julian Calendars, 30 B.C.-14 A.D.

series.title: Münchener Beiträge zur Papyrusforschung und antiken Rechtsgeschichte.

bibl.seg: SKEAT T.C., The Reign of Augustus in Egypt. Conversion Tables for the Egyptian and Julian Calendars, 30 B.C.-14 A.D. (Münchener Beiträge zur Papyrusforschung und antiken Rechtsgeschichte. 84.)
München, C.H. Beck, 1993, 8°, vii-44 pp. ISBN 3-406-37384-4.

C.R. par Gerardo Casanova, Aegyptus 74 (1994) pp. 189-190. - Marie-Luise Deissmann-Merten, Klio 77 (1995) pp. 497-498. - Paul Heilporn, AntCl 64 (1995) p. 493. - Alain Martin, ChrEg 70 (1995) Nos 139-140, pp. 319-320. - John F. Oates, BASP 31 (1994) pp. 171-172. - Bernhard Palme, Tyche 10 (1995) pp. 280-282.
